column6:
"WARRIORS",2005,9
The Gangwar consuming New York gets worse with Wilson Fisk in retreat and an emboldened Hammerhead making a big play for his criminal turf. As for Spider-Man, his attention gets diverted from the street scene when the Black Cat returns-and this time she won't take "no" for an answer. Meanwhile, Fisk brings in his favorite assassin to neutralize as many enemies as she can-and Elektra doesn't take prisoners! Parts 4 (of 7)

32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.50
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Bagley | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Scott Hanna | colorist:J. D. Smith
